subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: A deal that would make John Henry, the Boston Red Sox’ principal owner, a key investor in Roush Racing, a top Nascar team, is nearing completion.
snippet: A deal that would make John Henry, the Boston Red Sox’ principal owner, a key investor in Roush Racing, a top Nascar team, is nearing completion.
